alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 8:58PM CDT until April 08 at 3:24AM CDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at Montezuma...and at Terre Haute down to Mint Carmel. .Widespread lowland flooding continues along the Wabash River at Montezuma...and at Terre Haute to Mount Carmel. Moderate flooding is occurring at Mount Carmel...and is forecast to continue through Wednesday. The slow crest on the Wabash River is expected to reach Mount Carmel Sunday morning. Minor flooding may resume at Lafayette and Covington on Sunday. Flooding will continue for much of the Wabash into next week. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY, APRIL 08... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until Saturday, April 08. * IMPACTS...At 18.5 feet, High water surrounds elevated river cabins. County roads to these cabins are impassable. Agricultural flooding is in progress. Seep water develops behind levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday /9:00 PM EDT Friday/ the stage was 18.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Friday /9:00 PM EDT Friday/ was 18.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday afternoon and continue falling to 9.6 feet Monday, April 10. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated by noon Saturday.
